summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a large, armored enemy on top of a traditional Asian-style building. The environment features autumnal trees with orange leaves. The character is wielding a weapon, and there is a user interface visible, showing various icons and a health bar. The text at the bottom of the screen reads, "Quit your dawdling, will you? One scratch on my jars, just one, and you'll be a dead monkey!" indicating dialogue or instructions related to the gameplay.
